meanings.definition: Existing or occurring outside the solar system.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study extrasolar planets to learn about systems beyond our own.
meanings.sent2: The telescope detected an extrasolar object moving through space.
meanings.sent3: The aliens traveled in their extrasolar spaceship to explore new galaxies.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared like an extrasolar comet streaking through the universe.
meanings.sent5: The concept of extrasolar life forms fascinated the young astronomer.

meanings.definition: Relating to or coming from a star outside the solar system.
meanings.sent1: The astronomers observed an extrasolar flare from a distant star.
meanings.sent2: The spacecraft detected an extrasolar signal originating from a faraway sun.
meanings.sent3: The extrasolar energy source powered the alien spaceship on its journey.
meanings.sent4: Her smile shone like an extrasolar light beaming across the galaxy.
meanings.sent5: The extrasolar radiation emitted by the star was carefully monitored by scientists.
